sentences.sentence: Clark, hey, welcome back. See you've met the munchKin?
sentences.translation: 克拉克，嗨，欢迎回来。看来你已经和小家伙见过面了？

sentences.sentence: Who are you supposed to be You're like the little chief of police of Munchkin Land or something!
sentences.translation: 你这是打算装扮成谁啊？看起来像是小人国里的警官啊，或者是其他什么人！

sentences.sentence: There was one of the Munchkin girls who was so beautiful that I soon grew to love her with all my heart.
sentences.translation: 有一个芒奇金人的女子，她很美丽，不久就使我全心爱着她。
